name: Freeflow Revenge
description:
A combat prototype used to test a new freeflow combat system that can be used in upcoming projects also as part of the flow game jam. This combat which is Arkham Styled has the player take on a massive wave of enemies using only two buttons.

This combat system was developed to be very obtainable to younger audiences with a simple hit and counter system.

I hope this displays a great stepping stone for a future combat system!
